name: Wigan Council Open Data
description: Wigan Council Open Data is a datastore that holds a wide range of maps providing data on key features of the borough. Any datasets that cannot be presented in the form of a map, such as transparency data on council contracts or the gender pay gap, are instead directly available on the Wigan Council website in PDF format. The datastore uses Esri to make a wide range of data available to the public, from demographics to planning and housing.
